#include <iostream>
#include <string>

using namespace std;

string str = "";

string roman(int t)
{
	string s2 = "";	
	if (t == 0){
		s2+="";
	}
	if (t == 1){
		s2+="i";
	}
	if (t == 2){
		s2+="ii";
	}
	if (t == 3){
		s2+="iii";
	}
	if (t == 4){
		s2+="iv";
	}
	if (t == 5){
		s2+="v";
	}
	if (t == 6){
		s2+="vi";
	}
	if (t == 7){
		s2+="vii";
	}
	if (t == 8){
		s2+="viii";
	}
	if (t == 9 ){
		s2+="ix";
	}
//	cout<<s2<<endl;
	return s2;
}


void counting( string str)
{	
//	cout<<str<<endl;
	string s4 = "i";
	string s5 = "v";
	string s6 = "x";
	string s7 = "l";
	string s8 = "c";

	int i = 0, v = 0, x = 0, l = 0, c = 0;

//	int q = str.length();
//	cout<<q<<endl;

	for (int e = 0; e < str.length(); e++){
	
		string s3 = "";
		s3+=str.substr(e,1);
	//	cout<<s3<<endl;
	
		if (s3.compare(s4) == 0){
			i++;
		}
		else if (s3.compare(s5) == 0){
			v++;
		}
		else if (s3.compare(s6) == 0){
			x++;
		}
		else if (s3.compare(s7) == 0){
			l++;
		}
		else if (s3.compare(s8) == 0){
			c++;
		}
	}
	cout <<i<<"  "<<v<<"  "<<x<<"  "<<l<<"  "<<c<<endl; 	
}	

int main()
{
	int n = 1 , t;
	while (n > 0){
		str = "";
		cin>>t;			//Input No.
		if (t > 0){
		for ( int e = 1; e <= t; e++){
			string s = "";
			int a = e;
			if (a == 100){
				s+="c";
				a = 0;
			}	
			if(a >=90 && a < 100){
				s+="xc";
				a = a%90;
				s+=roman(a);//calling fn to append roman no corresp.(1 t0 9) 
				a = 0;// put a = 0,to avoid calling fn again for same task at LEVEL 'J'
			}	
	
			if (a >= 50 && a < 90){
				s+="l";
				a = a%50;
			}
			if ( a>= 40 && a < 50){
				s+="xl";
				a = a%40;
				s+=roman(a);//calling fn to append roman no corresp.(1 t0 9) 
				a = 0;// put a = 0,to avoid calling fn again for same task at LEVEL 'J'
			}	
			if (a >= 10 && a <  40){
				int w = a/10;
				string s1 = "";
				for (int i = 0; i < w; i++){
					s1+="x";
				}
				s+=s1;
				a = a%10;
			}
	/*...................LEVEL 'J'................................*/
			if (a > 0) {
				s+=roman(a);//calling fn to append roman no corresponding(1 to 9)
			//	break;
				a = 0;
			}
			str += s;
		}
		}else break;
		counting(str);	
	}
	return 0;
}
